shortDescription.en: ZeroTip â€” an indie game made in 3 days for the Loop theme, where you play as the last courier of 3077, rewinding time, teleporting, and using echoes of yourself to deliver pizza through a ruined cosmos.

description.en:
ZeroTip is an indie game created in just 3 days during a game jam.
The jamâ€™s theme was â€œLoopâ€, and our team brought it to life through the time rewind mechanic.

The game features two levels:

ğŸ“ Tutorial â€” a training level to master the basics;

ğŸš€ Main Level â€” a fully playable mission thatâ€™s challenging, fast-paced, and addictive.

The story takes place in the year 3077.
The world has fallen apart, civilization is gone â€” but delivery is sacred.
You are the last Glovo courier, racing through dead space to deliver pizza to the last hungry client.
Star storms, debris, and time distortions stand in your way.
But this time... something went wrong.

The â€œLoopâ€ theme is revealed through unique mechanics:

âª Time rewind â€” return to crucial moments to fix mistakes;

âœ¨ Teleportation â€” instant movement through space;

ğŸ§Š Echoes of yourself â€” frozen copies that remain in time, creating strategic possibilities.

ZeroTip is a game about endless retries, time paradoxes, and the belief that even at the end of the universe â€” the delivery must be made. ğŸš´â€â™‚ï¸ğŸ•ğŸ’«

Our Team:
ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ’» Dmytro Chekaliuk â€” Programmer
ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ’» Illia Avdosiev â€” Programmer
ğŸ¨ Volodymyr Kidin â€” 3D Designer
